languages.text: {n}Приложив руку к груди, Вигдис с чувством произносит:{/n} "Я бы не посмела и просто не додумалась насмехаться над Вашей Светлостью подобным образом. Признаться, я сама была поражена произошедшим".

{n}Vigdis puts a hand to her chest and says compassionately,{/n} "I would not have dared nor even thought of mocking Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} in such a shocking manner. I confess, I, too, was astounded by what was happening."
languages.original_text: {n}Приложив руку к груди, Вигдис с чувством произносит:{/n} "Я бы не посмела и просто не додумалась насмехаться над Вашей Светлостью подобным образом. Признаться, я сама была поражена произошедшим".

traits.locale_text: {n}Vigdis puts a hand to her chest and says with feeling:{/n} "I would not have dared or even thought of mocking Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} in such an egregious manner. I confess I too was astonished at what was happening."

{n}Vigdis puts a hand to her chest and says with feeling:{/n} "I would not have dared or even thought of mocking Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} in such an egregious manner. I confess I too was astonished at what was happening."

{n}Vigdis puts a hand to her chest and says compassionately,{/n} "I would not have dared nor even thought of mocking Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} in such a shocking manner. I confess, I too was astounded by what was happening."

{n}Vigdis puts a hand to her chest and says compassionately,{/n} "I would not have dared nor even thought of mocking Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} in such a shocking manner. I confess, I too was astounded by what was happening."

{n}Vigdis puts a hand to her chest and says compassionately,{/n} "I would not have dared nor even thought of mocking Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} in such a shocking manner. I confess, I, too, was astounded by what was happening."

{n}Vigdis puts a hand to her chest and says compassionately,{/n} "I would not have dared nor even thought of mocking Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} in such a shocking manner. I confess, I, too, was astounded by what was happening."

languages.text: {n}La main sur la poitrine, Vigdis vous dit avec compassion :{/n} « Jamais je n'aurais osé avoir ne serait-ce que l'idée de me moquer de Votre Seigneurie de cette façon. J'avoue avoir été trop abasourdie par ce qui se passait. »
languages.original_text: {n}Vigdis puts a hand to her chest and says compassionately,{/n} "I would not have dared nor even thought of mocking Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} in such a shocking manner. I confess, I, too, was astounded by what was happening."

traits.locale_text: {n}La main sur la poitrine, Vigdis vous dit avec compassion :{/n} « Jamais je n'aurais osé avoir ne serait-ce que l'idée de me moquer de Votre Seigneurie de cette façon. J'avoue avoir été trop abasourdie par ce qui se passait. »

languages.text: {n}维格迪斯把一只手放在胸前，同情地开了口。{/n}“我不敢以如此可怕的方式揶揄您，甚至连想都不敢想。我承认，发生的事情也让我十分震惊。”
languages.original_text: {n}Vigdis puts a hand to her chest and says compassionately,{/n} "I would not have dared nor even thought of mocking Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} in such a shocking manner. I confess, I, too, was astounded by what was happening."

traits.locale_text: {n}维格迪斯把一只手放在胸前，同情地开了口。{/n}“我不敢以如此可怕的方式揶揄您，甚至连想都不敢想。我承认，发生的事情也让我十分震惊。”

languages.text: {n}Vigdis legt sich eine Hand auf die Brust und sagt mitfühlend:{/n} "Ich hätte es nicht gewagt, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} auf solch schockierende Weise zu verspotten, ja nicht einmal daran zu denken. Ich muss gestehen, ich war zu erstaunt davon, was da geschieht."
languages.original_text: {n}Vigdis puts a hand to her chest and says compassionately,{/n} "I would not have dared nor even thought of mocking Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} in such a shocking manner. I confess, I, too, was astounded by what was happening."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vigdis legt sich eine Hand auf die Brust und sagt mitfühlend:{/n} "Ich hätte es nicht gewagt, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} auf solch schockierende Weise zu verspotten, ja nicht einmal daran zu denken. Ich muss gestehen, ich war zu erstaunt davon, was da geschieht."

languages.text: {n}Vigdis posa una mano sobre su pecho y dice compasivamente:{/n} «No me atrevería a burlarme de su señoría con un acto tan desagradable. Confieso que este suceso también me ha desconcertado».
languages.original_text: {n}Vigdis puts a hand to her chest and says compassionately,{/n} "I would not have dared nor even thought of mocking Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} in such a shocking manner. I confess, I, too, was astounded by what was happening."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vigdis posa una mano sobre su pecho y dice compasivamente:{/n} «No me atrevería a burlarme de su señoría con un acto tan desagradable. Confieso que este suceso también me ha desconcertado».

languages.text: {n}ヴィグディスは胸に手を当て、同情するかのように言った。{/n}「私は、こんな衝撃的なやり方で陛下を嘲笑する勇気も、考えもありません。正直に言うと、私も何が起こっているのかと驚きました」
languages.original_text: {n}Vigdis puts a hand to her chest and says compassionately,{/n} "I would not have dared nor even thought of mocking Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} in such a shocking manner. I confess, I, too, was astounded by what was happening."

traits.locale_text: {n}ヴィグディスは胸に手を当て、同情するかのように言った。{/n}「私は、こんな衝撃的なやり方で陛下を嘲笑する勇気も、考えもありません。正直に言うと、私も何が起こっているのかと驚きました」

languages.text: {n}Vigdis, elini göğsüne koyup samimi bir sesle konuşuyor.{/n} "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri ile bu şekilde alay etme cüretini aklımdan bile geçiremem. İtiraf etmek gerekirse ben de şaşkınlık içerisindeyim."
languages.original_text: {n}Vigdis puts a hand to her chest and says compassionately,{/n} "I would not have dared nor even thought of mocking Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} in such a shocking manner. I confess, I, too, was astounded by what was happening."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vigdis elini göğsüne koyarak, samimi bir sesle konuşuyor:{/n} "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri ile bu şekilde alay etme cüretini aklımdan bile geçiremem. İtiraf etmek gerekirse olan bitene dair ben de şaşkınlık içerisindeyim."
